    Building and managing the brand of a design & development studio.

    What I did

    • Logo & Brand Identity

    • Web Design
    • Visual Identity
    • HTML5/CSS3
    • Responsive Design & Build
    • Device Testing

    For over 18 months, I was the lead designer at the web design and development studio Serious Fox.

    During this time I was in charge of managing Serious Fox's brand identity. This included designing all the documents and correspondence sent out to clients, logo design, business cards, signage, all Serious Fox-related websites and more.
